gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 113, Hornets 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Hornets, 113-92. Jalen Brunson recorded 32 points, seven assists, and four rebounds for the Knicks, with Donte DiVincenzo adding 28 points, six rebounds, and five assists in the victory. Brandon Miller tallied 29 points (3-6 3PM) along with seven rebounds for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Knicks have won seven in a row and improve to 30-17, while the Hornets fall to 10-35.
